con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Swagger Petstore">This is a sample server Petstore server. You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/). For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.</doc> <resources base="http://petstore.swagger.io/v2"> <resource path="pet" id="/pet"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/pet"/> <method name="POST" id="addPet"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="addPet">Add a new pet to the store</doc> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </request> <response status="405"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT" id="updatePet"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="updatePet">Update an existing pet</doc> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </request> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="405"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="pet/findByStatus" id="/pet/findByStatus"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/pet/findByStatus"/> <method name="GET" id="findPetsByStatus"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="findPetsByStatus">Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings Finds Pets by status</doc> <request> <param name="status" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="status Parameter">Status values that need to be considered for filter</doc> </param> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="pet/findByTags" id="/pet/findByTags"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/pet/findByTags"/> <method name="GET" id="findPetsByTags"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="findPetsByTags">Muliple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing. Finds Pets by tags</doc> <request> <param name="tags" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="tags Parameter">Tags to filter by</doc> </param> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="pet/{petId}" id="/pet/{petId}"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/pet/{petId}"/> <method name="GET" id="getPetById"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="getPetById">Returns a single pet Find pet by ID</doc> <request> <param name="petId" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="petId Parameter">ID of pet to return</doc> </param> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST" id="updatePetWithForm"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="updatePetWithForm">Updates a pet in the store with form data</doc> <request> <param name="petId" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="petId Parameter">ID of pet that needs to be updated</doc> </param> <param name="name" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="name Parameter">Updated name of the pet</doc> </param> <param name="status" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="status Parameter">Updated status of the pet</doc> </param> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"/> </request> <response status="405"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"/> </response> </method> <method name="DELETE" id="deletePet"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="deletePet">Deletes a pet</doc> <request> <param name="api_key" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="header" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="petId" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="petId Parameter">Pet id to delete</doc> </param> </request> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="pet/{petId}/uploadImage" id="/pet/{petId}/uploadImage"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/pet/{petId}/uploadImage"/> <method name="POST" id="uploadFile"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="uploadFile">uploads an image</doc> <request> <param name="petId" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="petId Parameter">ID of pet to update</doc> </param> <param name="additionalMetadata" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="additionalMetadata Parameter">Additional data to pass to server</doc> </param> <param name="file" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="file Parameter">file to upload</doc> </param> <representation mediaType="multipart/form-data"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="multipart/form-data"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="store/inventory" id="/store/inventory"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/store/inventory"/> <method name="GET" id="getInventory"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="getInventory">Returns a map of status codes to quantities Returns pet inventories by status</doc> <request/> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="store/order" id="/store/order"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/store/order"/> <method name="POST" id="placeOrder"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="placeOrder">Place an order for a pet</doc> <request/> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="store/order/{orderId}" id="/store/order/{orderId}"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/store/order/{orderId}"/> <method name="GET" id="getOrderById"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="getOrderById">For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10. Other values will generated exceptions Find purchase order by ID</doc> <request> <param name="orderId" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="orderId Parameter">ID of pet that needs to be fetched</doc> </param> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="DELETE" id="deleteOrder"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="deleteOrder">For valid response try integer IDs with positive integer value. Negative or non-integer values will generate API errors Delete purchase order by ID</doc> <request> <param name="orderId" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="orderId Parameter">ID of the order that needs to be deleted</doc> </param> </request> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="user" id="/user"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/user"/> <method name="POST" id="createUser"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="createUser">This can only be done by the logged in user. Create user</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="user/createWithArray" id="/user/createWithArray"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/user/createWithArray"/> <method name="POST" id="createUsersWithArrayInput"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="createUsersWithArrayInput">Creates list of users with given input array</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="user/createWithList" id="/user/createWithList"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/user/createWithList"/> <method name="POST" id="createUsersWithListInput"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="createUsersWithListInput">Creates list of users with given input array</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="user/login" id="/user/login"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/user/login"/> <method name="GET" id="loginUser"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="loginUser">Logs user into the system</doc> <request> <param name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="username Parameter">The user name for login</doc> </param> <param name="password" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="password Parameter">The password for login in clear text</doc> </param> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="user/logout" id="/user/logout"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/user/logout"/> <method name="GET" id="logoutUser"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="logoutUser">Logs out current logged in user session</doc> <request/> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="user/{username}" id="/user/{username}"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="/user/{username}"/> <method name="GET" id="getUserByName"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="getUserByName">Get user by user name</doc> <request> <param name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="username Parameter">The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.</doc> </param> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT" id="updateUser"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="updateUser">This can only be done by the logged in user. Updated user</doc> <request> <param name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="username Parameter">name that need to be updated</doc> </param> </request> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="DELETE" id="deleteUser"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="deleteUser">This can only be done by the logged in user. Delete user</doc> <request> <param name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" default="" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="username Parameter">The name that needs to be deleted</doc> </param> </request> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>
